Day 1 Begins, Vote Count 1.1, Vote Count 1.2, Vote Count 1.3, Vote Count 1.4, Vote Count 1.5, Vote Count 1.6, Vote Count 1.7, Vote Count 1.8, Vote Count 1.9, Day 1 Death Scene

The Rules

General

01. All site-wide rules apply.

02. Regarding questions, either post in bold or PM me.

03. Hidden/encrypted text is not allowed.

04. Do not edit your posts.

05. Civility and respect is encouraged. Bad behavior'll result in warnings/removal.

06. Be remain civil and respectful. If not, warnings/removal ensue.

07. Do not discuss ongoing games anytime, anywhere, ever.

08. This is my color. Don't use it. All other colors are fine.

09. Please don't impersonate the mod.

10. If you break my rules, I may punish you. I'm creative. Beware.

11. I reserve the right to change my rules whenever I wish.

12. Scum, outwit Town. Town, uncover Scum. Have fun!

13. Also, Scum have Daytalk, meaning they can communicate with each other via a QuickTopic thread at any time.


Voting and Lynching

01. To vote, use either (Vote: Player) or (VOTE: Player).

02. Unvoting isn't required.

03. Using abbreviations of players' names while voting is fine, so long as I can understand it. Do not attempt tricking me.

04. A lynch occurs when half of players + 1—rounded down—vote the same person. Once a lynch happens, the game will enter the twilight period until the game is locked. Discussion may continue at this point until the thread is locked.

05. The majority MUST be reached before the deadline expires, or else a no-lynch will occur.

06. Players are allowed ONE "bah" post after being nightkilled. This MUST NOT contain any information with regards to the game, or the player will most likely be warned for breaking site rules.


Activity and Deadline

01. Deadline for each day is 14 days, and deadline for each night is 48 hours.

02. If you're on V/LA, please tell me beforehand by either posting it in thread or PM to me, if you can.

03. If you don't post here for 48 real hours, I will prod you. Failure to receive prod within 24 hours or receiving 3+ prods in game will cause force-replacement.

04. If you do not submit a night action, it will count as No Action.

05. If I have to extend deadline, I will. If I do, I will post it on thread.

Setup:
x11 Vanilla Townies
x2 Mafia Goons


Role PMs:

Welcome to Mini 1574! You are a Vanilla Townie!

Abilities

- You have your voice and your vote. Use them wisely.

Win Condition

- You win when all threats to the town are eliminated


Welcome to Mini 1574! You are a Mafia Goon!

Abilities

- As Scum you will deceive and kill members of Town. Scum have Daytalk. During each Night, one of you may submit to me the target of their Night Kill, whether via PM or in their QuickTopic thread.

Win Condition

- You win when all of town are eliminated, or nothing can prevent it from happening.

All Role PMs sent.

10/13 players confirmed!

Seeking replacement for bacde

Day 1 begins! With 13 alive, it takes 7 to lynch!

My revised read of each player:

Antihero has posted nothing since his confirmation.

bjc & Lootifer have contributed nothing aside from one RVS post each. Lootfier made one additional post asking someone about their experience playing mafia, overall nothing helpful.

Blue Yoshi has made one post since the jokearound stage and it was a valid point directed at gameplay (and by extension, myself) about us wasting time and distracting the town with a riveting discussion of Game of Thrones.

The players that I see as genuinely trying to discuss the game logically - roflcopter, iceNINJA, neil. Gameplay, I think is genuinely trying to help now after goofing around a bit.

Titus's post is hard to follow and I don't like that they are so quick to call Varsoon probably innocent.

Question Mark is the most suspicious to me. Nobody Special has admitted to deliberately avoiding discussion which seems unhelpful, but not necessarily scummy because I don't think mafia would just admit to dodging conversation. NS has also been voted by QM and Varsoon who I say as likely the two most suspicious players so far.

As a general matter, I ask questions about an investigation (good premise or bad premuse) but always avoid getting out of the way. Since Varsoon is a weak townread he gets a little more leeway.
